thread.title: Christie Trapp

author: Christie Trapp
title: Christie Trapp
text: Quick turn from the moment I expressed interest in product from Quote: , to proof, and final delivery. Nick was extremely helpful and gave me some various options of flash drives to consider along with a packaging tin that I did not even think of. Our order was for giveaways for conference attendees and I received glowing reviews on the classy look and the quality of the product. No need to shop anywhere else, bookmark your Internet page for Flashbay's website!
